div.div: at University Hts., OH | Shula Stadium

tr.td: JCU wins toss. Will receive. Wilmington to defend east goal.
Max Gabbard kickoff 40 yards to the JCU25, A. Greenwood return 12 yards to the JCU37 (Antonio Turner).
Mark Myers pass complete to Lane Robilotto for 37 yards to the WILM26, 1ST DOWN JCU (Devon Burton;Joe Joe Knecht).
Mark Myers pass incomplete to A. Greenwood.
